name: Little Shepherds Day Care & Preschool
description: Little Shepherds Day Care & Preschool is a licensed child care facility in London, Kentucky that provides quality early childhood education and care for children from toddlers to school-age. They offer a nurturing, faith-based environment where children can learn, grow, and develop in a safe and caring atmosphere. The center provides structured educational programs, age-appropriate activities, and a supportive environment for children's social, emotional, and cognitive development.
source: Verified from multiple business directories and review sites
cost_information: Call for current rates and availability
notes: Licensed child care facility with capacity for 69 children. Accepts vouchers. Founded in 2007. Principal Officer: Teresa Miller. Rated 3.8 out of 5 stars on Google reviews. Provides structured educational programs and age-appropriate activities.
